full_sentence: 'There was actually a discussion on SF Britain - more than ten years ago - and I remember the late JohnJoyTree, then an admin and one of the top moderators (who was also English) ruled that 'pikey' was a racial epithet to be avoided!. So stupid, it is a brilliant word'
